Greek Lamb¶

Ingredients¶

  • 3-4lbs leg of lamb, boned and tied
  • 3 to 4 tablespoon lemons, juice and zest of
  • 1⁄4 cup olive oil
  • 6 garlic cloves, minced
  • 1 teaspoon thyme
  • 1 teaspoon oregano
  • 1 teaspoon rosemary
  • 1 bay leaf
  • salt and pepper

Method¶

  1. Cut excess fat from leg of lamb.
  2. Combine all marinade ingredients in a bowl or baking dish large enough to accommodate the lamb and mix well. Message marinade into lamb making sure it is in everywhere. Cover and refrigerate overnight, turning often.
  3. Remove from refrigerator to allow it to reach room temperature about 30 minutes.
  4. Place on spit roast, and roast until inner temperature is 65 degrees usually 2 hours
